title: TELALEO 6 or 5 Pack Compression Shorts for Men Spandex Sport Shorts Athletic Workout Running Performance Baselayer Underwear
description: Compression support: Our compression shorts use Ergonomic design and 4-way stretch fabric, provide the best support for your hips and thighs muscles, increase muscle power and accelerate muscle recovery.
Breathable & Quick-dry: These compression underwear for men are made of spandex fabric, releases heat and wicks sweat quickly, keeps you dry and odor-free even after long time wear.
Flatlock Stitching: The sports compression shorts use flatlock Stitching, increase durability and prevent chafing during exercises, bring extremely comfort for any sports.
Elastic Waistband: Men’s running compression shorts using wide waistband design, fit close with your waist, provides comfort and anti-slippery, allowing you to move without limits.

Designed for All Sports: Men’s tights shorts provide UPF 50+ sun protection, perfect for all weather sports, such as: workout, running, basketball, fitness, cycling, baseball, tennis, weight training, surfing, squat, football, etc.
